public static java.lang.String extractURI(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.QuerySolution sol,
                                          java.lang.String varStr,
                                          boolean verbose)
Parameters:
sol - a solution from a SPARQL query
varStr - a variable name included in the SPARQL query
verbose - a flag that enables the verbose mode. It shows refused nodes
Returns:
the URI of the node identified by the variable name. If the node is anonymous or is not a resource, the method return null
